duties_responsibilities.duty: Negotiate rates with common carrier representatives.
Manage day-to-day activities with associates, ensuring safety and productivity are the focus.
Train new hires and create a team-centric environment.
Create and balance daily bank deposits, log creation, and transmission.
Audit daily labor, billing reports, and ensure customer needs are met.
Resolve customer service or associate issues.
Ensure associates follow safety and work rules, and participate in safety meetings.
Assist in managing site and departmental budget, scheduling associate shifts, and supervising timely and accurate data entry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Warehousing, Logistics, Supply Chain, or equivalent experience (Degree not required but preferred)
